snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown signed a bill allowing nurse practitioners, midwives and physician assistants to perform aspiration abortions during the first trimester.
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown expands access to abortion in the state, signing a bill to allow nurse practitioners, midwives and physician assistants to perform aspiration abortions, common type of the procedure, during the first trimester.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown signed a bill allowing nurse practitioners, midwives and physician assistants to perform aspiration abortions during the first trimester.
